p: Based on the gas chromatography analysis coupled with mass spectrometry and flame ionisation detectors, the commercial essential oils of thyme ( Thymus vulgaris L.), clove ( Eugenia caryophyllus), rosemary ( Rosmarinus officinalis L.), and tea tree ( Melaleuca alternifolia aetheroleum) were found to have compositions within the limits of the AFNOR/ISO standards.
